    Registers a new spare part in the system with the information received
    java.lang.String SuppliesCrudService.add​(SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto dto)
    Registers a new supply in the system for the indicated provider and spare part

    Removes the provider indicated by its nif from the system.
    void SparePartCrudService.delete​(java.lang.String code)
    Removes the spare part from the system if the spare part has not been used under any of its associations
    void SuppliesCrudService.delete​(java.lang.String nif, java.lang.String code)
    Removes from the system the supply uniquely indicated by the nif and code (a supply can be removed with no other considerations)
    java.util.Optional<OrdersService.OrderDto> OrdersService.findByCode​(java.lang.String code)

    Note: this operation is quite similar to

    Returns a list (might be empty) of all the spare whose description matches the pattern %%.

    OrdersService.OrderDto OrdersService.receive​(java.lang.String code)
    Updates prices and stocks of all involved spare parts and updates the order reception date to today and its status is changed to RECEIVED
    void ProvidersCrudService.update​(ProvidersCrudService.ProviderDto dto)
    Updates all the field for the provider except the id, nif and version.
    void SparePartCrudService.update​(SparePartCrudService.SparePartDto dto)
    Updates the fields of the spare part identified by code (or id) except code, id.
    void SuppliesCrudService.update​(SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto dto)
    Updates the supply with the new data from the incoming dto
